headline: Animation That Broke the Rules
abstract: The great Japanese animator Satoshi Kon died young in 2010 but his work continues to dazzle on the internet.
lead_paragraph: Looking over the lists critics have made of films and filmmakers that most impressed them during the past decade, I sorely miss the name of a 46-year-old director only hitting his stride at the time of his death in 2010, Satoshi Kon.
